
:::: {.content-visible unless-format="revealjs"}
To log a finding from the documentation overview: 

a. On your model's Documentation page, click **{{< fa plus >}} Add Model Finding**.

a. Select the finding type^[[Manage artifact types](/guide/model-validation/manage-artifact-types.qmd)] you want to add:

   - Validation Issue
   - Policy Exception
   - Model Limitation

a. On the Add Model Finding modal that opens, provide information for your finding.

a. When you are done, click **Save** to submit the finding. 

   Once created, you can then add supporting documentation to your finding.^[[Manage supporting documentation](/guide/model-validation/add-manage-artifacts.qmd#manage-supporting-documentation)]

::::
